abstract: Will the much rumored-Apple tablet computer appeal to a broad range of consumers?
snippet: Will the much rumored-Apple tablet computer appeal to a broad range of consumers?
lead_paragraph: Anticipation for Apple’s tablet computer is building. The Financial Times reported Monday that Apple was set to introduce the device in September, to coincide with a broader set of relationships with the major record labels. Last week, the blog Apple Insider said the company was preparing an early 2010 release of a tablet.

headline.main: Would You Buy the Mythical Apple Tablet?
